info.name: Becamex Investment and Industrial Development Group
info.description: Becamex Investment and Industrial Development Group engages in the investment and development of industrial, residential, urban, and transportation infrastructure projects in Vietnam. It constructs and trades in civil, industrial, and cs; develops and manages industrial parks; processes and trades in rubber and rubber products; and produces and trades in construction materials, including ready-mix concrete; and pharmaceutical products. The company is also involved in the leasing, management and wastewater treatment services of industrial parks; management of industrial zone; real estate trading; mineral mining, cement; ground leveling; medical examination and treatment; telecommunications businesses; and information technology, as well as maintenance, repair, exploitation, and traffic toll collection activities. Further, it invests and trades in electricity and solar energy, develops, manages, and operates power grid; offers mosaic and healing, educational, consulting, and warehousing and storage of goods services; and produces building materials. The company was formerly known as Investment and Industrial Development Corporation - JSC and changed its name to Becamex Investment and Industrial Development Group in October 2025. Becamex Investment and Industrial Development Group was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Thu Dau Mot City, Vietnam.
